game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.description: In a hidden corner of the world lies an ancient artifact of great power. You have been chosen to retrieve it and protect it from falling into the wrong hands.
game.reward: The artifact's power will be bestowed upon you, granting you unimaginable abilities.

task.description: The Oracle resides atop the highest peak. Seek her guidance and learn the path to the artifact.
In the heart of the Forbidden Jungle lies the Map of Ages. The map will guide you through treacherous terrain to the artifact's resting place.
In order to reach the artifact, you must pass through the Elemental Maze. Each chamber is guarded by a powerful elemental guardian. Defeat them to proceed.
The Lost Key is said to be hidden within the haunted crypt. Find it and unlock the final chamber leading to the artifact.

task.objective: Take hold of the Ancient Artifact
task.description: At long last, you have reached the chamber of the ancient artifact. Claim it and return to Elder Maelor to complete your quest.
